overview_of_class: First course of sequence designed to develop speaking strategies and structures through analysis of modern (20th- and 21st- century) Latin American culture. Emphasis on accurate informal conversation.
name: Conversation on Human Rights: Latin America
title: WCAS SPANISH 201-0-20 Conversation on Human Rights: Latin America

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: First course of sequence designed to develop speaking strategies and structures through analysis of modern (20th- and 21st- century) Latin American culture. Emphasis on accurate informal conversation.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisites: 199 or Spanish Language Placement Exam.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: For more information on the course contact the coordinator Penny Nichols pen@northwestern.edu

class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description
